fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget that will be placed inside the action.

fields.name: isDefaultAction
fields.desc: Indicates whether this action should receive the style of an emphasized, default action.

fields.name: isDestructiveAction
fields.desc: Indicates whether this action should receive the style of a destructive action.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: Called when the action is pressed.

fields.name: trailingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display to the right of the child.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of CupertinoContextMenuAction
desc: 【isDefaultAction】 : Whether it is the default action  【bool】
